title: El Salvador Inflation Rate MoM
description: The Consumer Price Index in El Salvador increased 0.25 percent in September of 2022 over the previous month. Inflation Rate MoM in El Salvador averaged 0.27 percent from 1993 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2.97 percent in April of 2011 and a record low of -3.31 percent in February of 1994. Inflation Rate MoM measures month over month change in the price of goods and services. This page provides - El Salvador Inflation Rate MoM- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Dirección General de Estadística y Censos - DIGESTYC
